uvi.description:
watchdog: sc520_wdt: Fix possible use-after-free in wdt_turnoff()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.4.276 by commit 0015581a79bbf8e521f85dddb7d3e4a66b9f51d4. For more details please see the references link.
